Title: Relates to the usage of funds in the New York state cannabis revenue fund
Summary: Authorizes funds in the New York state cannabis revenue fund to be used for reasonable costs of implementing track and tracing of product programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the usage of funds in the New York state cannabis revenue fund
